verses.verse: Then <S%H7126>drew<s%> near the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; and these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: <S%H4244>Mahlah<s%>, <S%H5270>Noah<s%>, and <S%H2295>Hoglah<s%>, and <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, and <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%>.

And they <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and he was not <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5712>company<s%> of them that gathered themselves <S%H3259>together<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>: but he <S%H4191>died<s%> in his own <S%H2399>sin<s%>; and he had no <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

Why should the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H1>father<s%> be taken <S%H1639>away<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H4940>family<s%>, because he had no <S%H1121>son<s%>? <S%H5414>Give<s%> unto us a <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of our <S%H1>father<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> their <S%H4941>cause<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3651>right<s%>: thou shalt <S%H5414>surely<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H272>possession<s%> of an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H251>brethren<s%>; and thou shalt cause the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%> to pass unto <S%H5674>them<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, and have no <S%H1121>son<s%>, then ye shall cause his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.
And if he have no <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, then ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.
And if he have no <S%H251>brethren<s%>, then ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And if his <S%H1>father<s%> have no <S%H251>brethren<s%>, then ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto his <S%H7607>kinsman<s%> that is <S%H7138>next<s%> to him of his <S%H4940>family<s%>, and he shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1121>it<s%>: and it shall be unto the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2708>statute<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> into this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And when thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H622>it<s%>, thou also shalt be gathered unto thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> was <S%H622>gathered<s%>;

because ye <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against my <S%H6310>word<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%>, in the <S%H4808>strife<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> me at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>. (These are the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah<s%> of <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%>.)
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Let <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, <S%H6485>appoint<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> over the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>,

who may go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>, and who may come in <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3318>them<s%>, and who may lead them out, and who may bring them <S%H935>in<s%>; that the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be not as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> which have no <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> thee <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, a <S%H376>man<s%> in whom is the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>, and <S%H5564>lay<s%> thy hand upon <S%H3027>him<s%>;

and <S%H5975>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>; and give him a <S%H6680>charge<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> of thine <S%H1935>honor<s%> upon <S%H5712>him<s%>, that all the congregation of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H8085>obey<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, who shall <S%H7592>inquire<s%> for him by the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H224>Urim<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: at his <S%H6310>word<s%> shall they go <S%H3318>out<s%>, and at his <S%H6310>word<s%> they shall come <S%H935>in<s%>, both <S%H1121>he<s%>, and all the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H5712>him<s%>, even all the congregation.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3947>him<s%>; and he took <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and <S%H5975>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>:
and he <S%H5564>laid<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon <S%H6680>him<s%>, and gave him a charge, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
